survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Subscription-Based Coffee Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, satisfaction levels, and purchasing behaviors related to subscription-based coffee delivery services.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase coffee for home consumption?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Have you ever subscribed to a coffee delivery service?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. This question helps segment the audience for subsequent questions.

script.question_text: Have you ever subscribed to a coffee delivery service?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which factors are most important to you when choosing a coffee delivery service? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is answered as 'Yes' or 'No'.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with a limit of 3 selections. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

questions.question_text: What is your preferred delivery frequency for a coffee subscription?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is answered as 'Yes' or 'No'.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include an option for non-subscription preference.

script.question_text: What is your preferred delivery frequency for a coffee subscription?
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is answered as 'Yes' or 'No'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current or most recent coffee subscription service?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is answered as 'Yes' or 'No'.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with a balanced Likert scale. Include an N/A option.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current or most recent coffee subscription service?
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is answered as 'Yes' or 'No'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for coffee subscription services?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is answered as 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Mobile-friendly input box recommended.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for coffee subscription services?
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is answered as 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: What is the maximum monthly amount you would be willing to pay for a premium coffee subscription?
